import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BinPackingComponent=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[item,setItem]=useState('');const[binCapacity,setBinCapacity]=useState('');const handleAddItem=()=>{setItems([...items,parseFloat(item)]);setItem('');};const handleSubmit=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('https://combinatorics-solver.onrender.com/bin_packing',{items,bin_capacity:parseFloat(binCapacity)});console.log('Bins:',response.data.bins);}catch(error){console.error('Error solving Bin Packing problem',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Bin Packing Problem"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Item size",value:item,onChange:e=>setItem(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddItem,children:"Add Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Bin Capacity",value:binCapacity,onChange:e=>setBinCapacity(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,children:"Solve Bin Packing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(items)})]});};export default BinPackingComponent;
